content: AG 700-14D Angle grinder Angle grinder with dead man’s switch, for metal cutting and grinding with discs up to 7 ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Grinders and sanders- - - ### FEATURES:Features Multi-finger dead man’s switch for extra safety Adjustable, three-position side handle – for a secure, comfortable grip when working in any position Spindle lock for fast, easy disc changes Applications Weld grinding and metal preparation ### TECHNICAL DATA: Disc diameter: 7 in Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery: 11.5 lb. Max. cutting depth: 1.65 in Technical Data | Disc diameter | 7 in | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 11.5 lb | Max. cutting depth | 1.65 in | Trigger type | Paddle with deadman | Disclaimer | Use specific guard depending on selected disc ### ITEMS- 3578887 - AG 700-14D - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x AG 700-14D 120V Angle grinder - 1x M14 / 5/8 Installation wrench - 1x Basic LAG Comfort side handle - 1x Ø180 Protective cover - 1x Ø 45 / 5/8 Flange - 1x Nut - 1x Protective cover 180 mm / 7 (Type 27)
